author: jimmygchen
content:
looks like there are some discussions on using it for Lido here but i don't see any integration implemented:
https://github.com/lidofinance/validator-ejector/issues/89

author: jimmygchen
content: I'm happy leaving it as it is and introduce the new endpoint in the future if it's causing confusions. I think it's more of an aesthetic thing, if people are using it and not complaining then probably ok to leave it as it is, and like you said changing it would probably be more disruptive. Just thought it was a good point <@586161934425128960> brought up, and it was an oversight on my part that I was kind of hoping to fix, but I guess I've just got to bite the bullet this time and learn from the lesson.
